name: The Not So Great Outdoors
description:
It's 6p0m, Bill has a car accident and is stranded in the forest at night. He has to wait until 8am for the rescue to come and get him. 

Unfortunately for him, the forest is not welcoming. 

Gather wood, feed, and negotiate with the animals of the forest and try to SURVIVE in these "not so great outdoors".
